column1: "description": "This table gives an insight into the funds released to States and Union Territories of India under the e-Panchayat Mission Mode Project (MMP) for the Financial Year 2011-12 for the setting up of Programme Management Units (PMUs) at State and District levels. The PMUs are intended to provide ..."
"title": "Download XLS for Release of Funds to States under e-Panchayat MMP_2011-12"
